TextView.android:text: Android 6.0 or Marshmallow is high in the news these days. These headlines about Marshmallow are making people think whether their current Android device will be upgraded to the latest version or they will be left behind. A basic measure would be that most of the devices which came with Android 5.0 (Lollipop) out of the box will be updated to the latest Android 6.0. This post tries to list up the devices for which Android 6.0 update is imminent.
